use_original_title.desc: Show medias original titles instead of localized titles.

display_type.desc: The way files and directories should be displayed in the explorer.

id.hint: Write the ID or paste the media's page link.

error.media_update: Failed to update the media, make sure the ID is associated to a media on IMDb or TMDb.
